postBootScript:
#!/bin/bash
yum install -y wget
 wget  http://geni-images.renci.org/images/kthare10/scripts/pos/pos_mobius_start.sh -O /root/mobius_start_up.sh
 sh /root/mobius_start_up.sh WORKFLOW all
 wget http://geni-images.renci.org/images/kthare10/scripts/pos/worker.sh -O /root/worker_gpu.sh
 sh /root/worker.sh
